profile.description: Full-Stack Developer with approximately 5 years of experience, working across front-end, back-end, and integrations. I have a methodical and organized approach, value good architecture decisions, and constantly seek to improve the quality and evolution of the systems I build.

qualities.ownership: End-to-end ownership of features and systems

job1.title: Full-Stack Developer | AI Products
bullets: Led development of white-label AI SaaS platform with end-to-end ownership of architecture, implementation, and operations.
Architected multi-tenant system with subdomain routing, custom domains, and context propagation via Edge Middleware.
Implemented complete billing with Stripe (Subscriptions + Connect), including webhooks and automated reconciliation.
Integrated LLMs in production (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google) with multimodal streaming via Vercel AI SDK.
Orchestrated and standardized configurable agents and workflows with LangChain/LangGraph for automations and external integrations.
Standardized observability (Sentry + PostHog) and security (per-user AES-256 encryption).

job2.title: Mid-Level Front-End Developer
job2.description: Development of web applications for corporate clients using Next.js and TypeScript. Work on API integrations and UI component standardization.

job3.title: Front-End Intern
job3.description: Development and maintenance of features in web system, using React and TypeScript.

job4.title: IT Intern
job4.description: Technical support and development of small internal automations.

job5.title: Graphic Designer
job5.description: Development of graphic projects and visual identity as a freelancer.
